text: Morris Harvey (25 September 187724 August 1944) was a British actor and writer. A renowned character actor, he also wrote for the stage, including material for Broadway revues, in which he also appeared. He was the stepfather of film director Anthony Harvey. ==Filmography== {|class="wikitable" |- ! Year ! Title ! Role !
